alert.note: Alert for Polk; Trinity (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 8:32PM CDT until March 31 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Trinity County in southeastern Texas... Northwestern Polk County in southeastern Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 831 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Groveton, or 14 miles southwest of Apple Springs, moving east at 40 mph. If this storm strengthens, quarter size hail will be the main severe weather threat. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Groveton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Texas.
